meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Hans Reodica Sara Garnett Joshua Brakhage Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6553.

td.p: Hans Reodica, a CPA from Navarre, Florida
Sara Garnett, a graduate student of zoology originally from Okemos, Michigan
Joshua Brakhage, a TV news producer originally from South Coffeyville, Oklahoma (whose 5-day cash winnings total $103,205)

tr.td: "P"s ON EARTH
OH, A WISE GUY!
ANIMAL TALK
GOLD RUSH
SILVER ANNIVERSARIES
THE BRONZE AGE

tr.td: Born in this city, Galileo is said to have dropped objects of various weights from atop its famed landmark
